```{python}
#| label: fig-pfd-diagram4
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "VCO feedback and reference signal have different frequencies (the VCO frequency is too high). There will be some periods with a wrong output (as shown here in the first cycle), but on average the phase-frequency detector output will indicate that the VCO frequency must be decreased."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.logic as lgc

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    lgc.TimingDiagram(
    {'signal': [
        {'name': 'f_ref', 'wave': '01...0...1.'},
        {'name': 'f_fb', 'wave': '0.1.0.1.0.1'},
        {},
        {'name': 'up', 'wave': '010........'},
        {'name': 'down', 'wave': '0.....1..0.'}
        ]
    })

```
